sub_title:
Pit Pure Power

Sustainability - Energy Access - Social Enterprises- New Economy - Sustainable Value Chains - Theory U
summary:
Pit Pure Power is an internationally focused business development and consultancy boutique established by Daphne Pit with the aim of accelerating the transition towards a more sustainable planet, society and economy.

Through the work of Pit Pure Power, I pursue my two personal dreams:

To help sustainability become mainstream

To help achieve energy access for everybody everywhere

This is done by strengthening social enterprises and assisting sustainable start-ups in a tangible way, increasing their impact and supporting them to become more successful. Additionally, Pit Pure Power helps investors to find investor-ready, sustainable enterprises.

With over 15 years experience in sustainability, in both the corporate and non-corporate sectors, I am now working directly with organisations focused on increasing their social or sustainable impact in the world.

I have expertise in the fields of:

social enterprises
energy access in India, Nepal and Africa
impact investment
sustainable value chains
project and program management

Fund (UNCDF)', 'description': 'The UN Capital Development Fund (UNCDF) makes public and private finance work for the poor in the world's 47 least developed countries (LDCs).

UNCDF offers “last mile” finance models that unlock public and private resources to reduce poverty and support local economic development. This last mile is where available resources for development are scarcest; where market failures are most pronounced; and where benefits from national growth tend to leave people excluded.

At UNCDF I am involved in the CleanStart, a programme that co-invests in early stage innovations from financial institutions, distributed energy service companies and other providers of wholesale or retail financing for clean energy. The goal is to fill a "missing middle" in energy financing, as well as facilitate access to additional, more commercial financing for proven business models to scale. 

My activities include the design of a Burkina Faso "Clean Energy for People Resilience" challenge fund.', 'title': 'Consultant in Financing Energy Access ', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1024737, 'name': 'TCX', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFfjxh8rv8pjQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1673361936980?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=M8Y3D2qkWyYmriUVBqGBgipVypTyWcf4TtKZnBQ2Zdg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/tcxfund/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'TCX', 'description': 'By hedging currency risk, TCX contributes to more sustainable development in emerging and frontier markets.
